verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to her that is <S%H4754>rebellious<s%> and <S%H1351>polluted<s%>! to the <S%H3238>oppressing<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>!

She <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%>; she <S%H3947>received<s%> not <S%H4148>correction<s%>; she <S%H982>trusted<s%> not in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; she drew not <S%H7126>near<s%> to her <S%H430>God<s%>.

Her <S%H8269>princes<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of her are <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%>; her <S%H8199>judges<s%> are <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H2061>wolves<s%>; they leave <S%H1633>nothing<s%> till the <S%H1242>morrow<s%>.

Her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are <S%H6348>light<s%> and <S%H900>treacherous<s%> <S%H582>persons<s%>; her <S%H3548>priests<s%> have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, they have done <S%H2554>violence<s%> to the <S%H8451>law<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of her is <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; he will not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>; <S%H1242>every<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> doth he <S%H5414>bring<s%> his <S%H4941>justice<s%> to <S%H216>light<s%>, he <S%H5737>faileth<s%> <S%H5767>not<s%>; but the unjust <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> no <S%H1322>shame<s%>.

I have cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>; their <S%H6438>battlements<s%> are <S%H8074>desolate<s%>; I have made their <S%H2351>streets<s%> <S%H2717>waste<s%>, so that none passeth <S%H5674>by<s%>; their <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H6658>destroyed<s%>, so that there is no <S%H376>man<s%>, so that there is no <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>.

I <S%H559>said<s%>, Only <S%H3372>fear<s%> thou <S%H3947>me<s%>; receive <S%H4148>correction<s%>; so her <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> shall not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>, <S%H834>according<s%> to all that I have <S%H6485>appointed<s%> concerning <S%H403>her<s%>: but they rose <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> all their <S%H5949>doings<s%>.

Therefore <S%H2442>wait<s%> ye for <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, until the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I rise <S%H6965>up<s%> to the <S%H5706>prey<s%>; for my <S%H4941>determination<s%> is to <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, that I may <S%H6908>assemble<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>, to <S%H8210>pour<s%> upon them mine <S%H2195>indignation<s%>, even all my <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>; for all the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>.

For then will I <S%H2015>turn<s%> to the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of a <S%H1305>pure<s%> <S%H8193>language<s%>, that they may all <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7926>consent<s%>.

From <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> my <S%H6282>suppliants<s%>, even the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H6327>dispersed<s%>, shall <S%H2986>bring<s%> mine <S%H4503>offering<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shalt thou not be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> for all thy <S%H5949>doings<s%>, wherein thou hast <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against <S%H5493>me<s%>; for then I will take away out of the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee thy <S%H1346>proudly<s%> <S%H5947>exulting<s%> <S%H3254>ones<s%>, and thou shalt no more be <S%H1361>haughty<s%> in my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.

But I will <S%H7604>leave<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee an <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they shall take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

The <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, nor <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%>; neither shall a <S%H8649>deceitful<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; for they shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> and lie <S%H7257>down<s%>, and none shall make them <S%H2729>afraid<s%>.

Sing <S%H7442><s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; <S%H7321>shout<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and <S%H5937>rejoice<s%> with all the <S%H3820>heart<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath taken <S%H5493>away<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, he hath cast <S%H6437>out<s%> thine <S%H341>enemy<s%>: the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, even <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H7200>thee<s%>; thou shalt not fear evil any <S%H7451>more<s%>.
In that <S%H3117>day<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> thou <S%H6726>not<s%>; O Zion, let not thy <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H7503>slack<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H1368>thee<s%>, a mighty one who will <S%H3467>save<s%>; he will <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> over thee with <S%H8057>joy<s%>; he will <S%H2790>rest<s%> in his <S%H160>love<s%>; he will <S%H1523>joy<s%> over thee with <S%H7440>singing<s%>.
I will <S%H622>gather<s%> them that <S%H3013>sorrow<s%> for the solemn <S%H4150>assembly<s%>, who were of <S%H4864>thee<s%>; to whom the burden upon her was a <S%H2781>reproach<s%>.

Behold <S%H6256><s%>, at that time I will <S%H6213>deal<s%> with all them that <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H3467>thee<s%>; and I will save that which is <S%H6760>lame<s%>, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> that which was driven <S%H5080>away<s%>; and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> them a <S%H8416>praise<s%> and a <S%H8034>name<s%>, whose <S%H1322>shame<s%> hath been in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H6256>in<s%>, and at that time will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H5414>you<s%>; for I will make you a <S%H8034>name<s%> and a <S%H8416>praise<s%> among all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, when I bring <S%H7725>back<s%> your <S%H7622>captivity<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
